title: Make a Hangouts call from Contacts or Maps with Phone app disabled
content:
How can I select a phone number from Google Contacts or Google Maps and place a Hangouts call? 

So Sad!  I now receive the error message, "Cannot make a call without phone permission."  :( I use Hangouts ONLY on wifi or data for *ALL* of my phone calls and text messages!!!  

My Ting service provider has Calls and Text Messages BLOCKED and subsequently, of course, I have the Google Phone app and Google Messages app disabled! 

For half a decade I have enjoyed no problems making calls this way through Google Contacts and Google Maps with Hangouts on my LG Nexus 5X :)  How do I now enable my new PIXEL to do the same thing????? 

I just want to click a phone number and make a phone call. 
Thanks for any help you can provide.
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3a XL
